description: Description of the cluster policy. This policy is used for task prioritization and fair-share allocation. This helps prioritize critical workloads and distributes idle compute across entities.

nested_items.name: ClusterSchedulerConfigArn
nested_items.description: ARN of the cluster policy.

nested_items.name: ClusterSchedulerConfigId
nested_items.description: ID of the cluster policy.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: Name of the cluster policy.

nested_items.name: ClusterSchedulerConfigVersion
nested_items.description: Version of the cluster policy.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: Status of the cluster policy.

nested_items.name: FailureReason
nested_items.description: Failure reason of the cluster policy.

nested_items.name: ClusterArn
nested_items.description: ARN of the cluster where the cluster policy is applied.

nested_items.name: SchedulerConfig
nested_items.description: Cluster policy configuration. This policy is used for task prioritization and fair-share allocation. This helps prioritize critical workloads and distributes idle compute across entities.

nested_items.name: PriorityClasses
nested_items.description: List of the priority classes, PriorityClass, of the cluster policy. When specified, these class configurations define how tasks are queued.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: Name of the priority class.

nested_items.name: Weight
nested_items.description: Weight of the priority class. The value is within a range from 0 to 100, where 0 is the default.

nested_items.name: FairShare
nested_items.description: When enabled, entities borrow idle compute based on their assigned FairShareWeight.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: Description of the cluster policy.

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: Creation time of the cluster policy.

nested_items.name: CreatedBy
nested_items.description: Information about the user who created or modified an experiment, trial, trial component, lineage group, project, or model card.

nested_items.name: UserProfileArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the user's profile.

nested_items.name: UserProfileName
nested_items.description: The name of the user's profile.

nested_items.name: DomainId
nested_items.description: The domain associated with the user.

nested_items.name: IamIdentity
nested_items.description: The IAM Identity details associated with the user. These details are associated with model package groups, model packages, and project entities only.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM identity.

nested_items.name: PrincipalId
nested_items.description: The ID of the principal that assumes the IAM identity.

nested_items.name: SourceIdentity
nested_items.description: The person or application which assumes the IAM identity.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedTime
nested_items.description: Last modified time of the cluster policy.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedBy
nested_items.description: Information about the user who created or modified an experiment, trial, trial component, lineage group, project, or model card.
